item.title: How to Create Hugo Contact Form with Google Forms (FREE!)
item.description: Pre-requisite: A google account A website created off Hugo template First, create a contact form with Google form, and get the field name for each required field of the form by inspecting webpage elements (usually they start with “entry:").

item.title: Thank you!

item.title: I am Yujuan
item.description: Hey hey, this is Yujuan! Thanks for checking out my personal website. ðŸ™‚ I’m currently a software engineer @Tripadvisor based in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. This blog is where I share mainly my professional life, and maybe some random stuff in life time to time.
